spells.name: Cloak of Winds
spells.description: Creates screen of strong wind around you.

spells.name: Create Treasure Map
spells.description: Creates treasure map out of a creature's corpse.

spells.name: Cup of Dust
spells.description: Causes a creature to become dehydrated.

spells.name: Feather Step, Mass
spells.description: As feather step, but multiple creatures.

spells.name: Hide Campsite
spells.description: Hides all traces of your campsite.

spells.name: Hydraulic Torrent
spells.description: Creates torrent of water that bull rushes any creature in its path.

spells.name: Lily Pad Stride
spells.description: Walk across water on moving lily pads.

spells.name: Shifting Sand
spells.description: Creates difficult terrain and erases tracks; can carry creatures or objects along.
